frontmatter.title: Getting Started
frontmatter.meta_title: FluxStore - Universal mobile commerce Flutter app for Magento, WooCommerce and Opencart
frontmatter.meta_description: Fluxstore is universal app that fully integration with the Woocommerce, Mangeto and Opencart

markdownRemark.html:
Setup Flutter envoriment

Follow base on the operating system on which you are installing Flutter:

  1. Mac OS: https://flutter.dev/docs/get-started/install/macos
  2. Window: https://flutter.dev/docs/get-started/install/windows
  3. Linux: https://flutter.dev/docs/get-started/install/linux
